verses.roman:
eta kahi' mahāprabhu mauna dharilā
śuniyā sabāra mane santoṣa ha-ilā

synonyms: eta kahi'-saying this; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mauna dharilā—became very grave; śuniyā—hearing; sabāra—of all the devotees; mane—in the mind; santoṣa ha-ilā—there was great satisfaction.
translation: After saying this, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was very grave. All the devotees present derived great satisfaction from hearing this statement.
